metadata.description: Dialog Driven Delivery - A pragmatic workflow for building software through conversational, transcript-first documentation and development. Create specs, refine them, and decompose into user stories.

plugins.name: d3
plugins.description: Dialog Driven Delivery - A pragmatic workflow for building software through conversational, transcript-first documentation and development. Create specs, refine them, and decompose into user stories.

plugins.name: d3-atlassian
plugins.description: Atlassian provider for D3 (Dialog Driven Delivery). Enables D3 to work with Confluence for specifications and Jira for user stories.

plugins.name: d3-markdown
plugins.description: Markdown provider for D3 (Dialog Driven Delivery). Enables D3 to work with local markdown files for specifications and user stories. Perfect for solo developers and small teams.
